name: Chipsse Solid 3: The Green Adventure ++
description:
Chipsse Solid 3: The Green Adventure ++ is an additional version of the artistic game Chipsse Solid 3: The Green Adventure who presents a personal vision of the fact what is the search for Graphic designer for a project of game.
Take control of master Wasa Karate and 4 other characters, discover certain shadow zones via epilogues and finally play the game of Chipsse Solid !
